name: Rapidream
description:
Let designers worry about the design - let developers about the code - and let Rapidream worry about bridging the gap.


Rapidream consists of:

  • A Figma plugin to push designs
  • A powerful in-browser dev tool for rapid customization of the code output


Use Rapidream with any design! No need for the designer to think about the DOM tree output or how to implement responsiveness.


Instead, Rapidream:

  • cleans, merges and normalizes the design nodes - often reducing the number by 50-80% - to ensure the cleanest and most minimal code output;
  • examines the design and determines the correct nesting and ordering of elements for proper responsive rendering in the browser;
  • intelligently extracts fonts and assets and automatically makes them available to the developer;
  • outputs Styled Components, flex, and more!


Sign up for our beta at rapidream.com.


P.S. The beautiful Figma design above was made by holomusic.co and converted to React by Rapidream.
